puntogo.description: Smart rewards system that turns every visit into a game experience, multiplying your loyalty value up to 10X.
puntogo.problemP1: Traditional loyalty programs are boring and forgettable.
puntogo.problemP2: Customers collect points slowly, rewards feel distant, and daily engagement is zero.
puntogo.problemP3: Result? Low retention and missed revenue opportunities.
puntogo.solutionP1: PuntoGo gamifies loyalty with daily engagement mechanics.
puntogo.solutionP2: Spin the wheel every 24h for 2X-10X multipliers. Turn a $100 meal into 1,000 points.
puntogo.solutionP3: Result? Customers come back daily, spend more, and love the experience.
puntogo.feature1Desc: 1 punto = $1 MXN. Direct redemption at checkout. Simple, transparent, valuable.
puntogo.feature2Desc: Spin the wheel every 24h. Win 2X, 3X, 5X, or legendary 10X multipliers.
puntogo.feature3Desc: Activate your multiplier and watch your points explode. Limited time = urgency.
puntogo.feature4Desc: Real-time menu with Polo Tab API. Browse, order, and earn points seamlessly.
puntogo.feature5Desc: Upload receipt photo. Google Vision OCR extracts totals. Auto-awards points.
puntogo.feature6Desc: 6 modules: QR scanner, menu management, points control, analytics, and more.
puntogo.step1Desc: Browse menu, order food, pay at checkout. Every peso = 1 point automatically.
puntogo.step2Desc: Open app, spin Daily Drop wheel. Win multipliers: 2X (common), 5X (rare), 10X (legendary).
puntogo.step3Desc: Multiplier active for 24h. Next purchase: $500 × 5X = 2,500 points. Magic.
puntogo.step4Desc: Points = money. Redeem at checkout. 1,000 points = $1,000 MXN off. Simple.
puntogo.resultsDesc: From concept to beta with real users. Complete gamification system, admin dashboard, and production-ready infrastructure.
puntogo.ctaTitle: Want a loyalty system like this?
puntogo.ctaDesc: Custom gamification, mobile apps, and admin tools in weeks.
